charges.charge_description: Ct 1: Illegal re-entry into the United States (found in)  8 U.S.C. 1326(1)

8 USC 1326(a)(1)(b)(1); an alien who had previously been denied admission, excluded deported or removed, knowingly and unlawfully was present in the United States,  the said defendant having not obtained the consent of the Attorney General or the Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security to reapply for admission into the United States
